title: j_calsina
author: j_calsina
content: GM, I've been thinking for a while about the crypto situation nowadays. Yesterday we saw the US government selling 9,4k BTC... Days ago I found the KASPA.org project. It solves Bitcoin trilemma... Did you hear about this one, KAS.In the meme-coin field, PEPE was amazing but logically buying before no one, was obvious. I will consider buying Dogelon mars (some dollars) cause in the future Elon goes to the moon it will pump hard. At least I will lose the same as going out for dinner. Have you found any future gem (x100) with strengths and good fundamentals...?Nice day

comments.author: swogerino
comments.body: Quote from: j_calsina on May 11, 2023, 09:14:16 AMHave you found any future gem (x100) with strengths and good fundamentals...?Maybe not a future x100 but surely an x20-x50 gem is ZIL which has clear potential to grow that normally if it goes to the last all time high is already x13-x15 which is very much doable,also the price of such coin is real low and it is a wise investment I would suggest in our time.I have checked the market and check it regularly and beside this coin I don't find any other one particularly amusing,well except KASPA maybe but that is a relatively new coin and I would wait some time more before I make any move on it.

comments.author: j_calsina
comments.body: I recommend you to check KAS, incredible future ahead and big community...
